job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: About Nimble Nimble is a Series A startup founded from the AI labs at Stanford and Carnegie Mellon. We’re pioneering the way robots learn to grasp and manipulate any object. Our ultimate goal is to create the dark warehouse, a fully automated eCommerce fulfillment center with swarms of intelligent, cloud-connected robots to enable affordable same-day fulfillment for every retailer, large and small. In the process we aim to create one of the world’s most valuable robotics companies. We’re backed by the world’s most prestigious investors as well as AI and robotics legends like Fei-Fei Li (Chief Scientist of AI at Google, Director of Stanford’s AI lab) and Sebastian Thrun (founder of Google X, Waymo, Kitty Hawk, and Udacity)! About The Role Help us advance our robotics moonshot by designing, building, and supporting features that empower machine learning algorithms and robotic systems. You’ll create foundational, scalable systems that extend horizontally throughout the stack. You will design and architect solutions to complex software engineering challenges, take ownership of projects, and push deployments to production. You will play a critical role in working with our world-class cross-functional team to architect and build the world’s most advanced robotic systems for the world’s biggest robotics opportunity! Responsibilities Develop large-scale distributed systems and data processing systems Develop advanced algorithms to obtain optimal real-time performance Design APIs for testability, scalability, usability and maintainability Develop and maintain massive data infrastructure Provide input on all aspects of product development from brainstorming to final delivery. Welcome new challenges and work independently across disciplines to both investigate issues and identify solutions. Qualifications Fast learner, A-player, great work ethic and ambitious BS/MS/Ph.D. in Computer Science, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering or a related discipline, or equivalent experience. Strong experience writing production code in Python and C++ 3+ years of experience with Linux or embedded Linux. Expert with Linux Strong problem solver and advanced Python programming Ability to identify and resolve bugs and issues. Nice To Have Participation in hackathons Experience with robotics, ROS Machine Learning Infrastructure Software Performance tuning and Optimization Robotics Software Frameworks Benefits Comprehensive medical, dental, and vision insurance. Paid holidays, generous PTO, competitive wages and meaningful equity of Nimble. Culture We embrace challenges and strive to make the impossible possible each day. We’re not in this to do what’s easy or to be mediocre. We want to create something legendary and leave our mark on the world. We’re ambitious, we’re gritty, we’re humble and we’re relentlessly resourceful in pursuit of our goals. If this sounds like you then you might be a great fit! Press https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20210311005117/en/Nimble-%C2%AE-Robotics-Raises-[…]llion-to-Build-the-Future-of-On-Demand-Robotic-Fulfillment https://techcrunch.com/2021/03/11/nimble-robotics-scores-50m-for-its-fulfillment-automation-tech/ https://multichannelmerchant.com/operations/nimble-robotics-takes-in-50m-adds-ai-luminaries/ Equal Opportunity Employer We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We prohibit any form of workplace discrimination based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
